We regret to announce the passing away of Mrs CHITRA ELLAN MENDIS,​ beloved daughter of late Major Milan Mendis and late Mrs Ellan Gajanayaka,​ wife of late Mr Justin Amarasekera (Attorney-at-Law),​ beloved mother of Ms Jeevanie and Thilini Amarasekera (Australia),​ beloved mother-in-law of Indika Perera (Australia),​ beloved grandmother of Alisha and Aksha (Australia),​ beloved sister of Shirani (Germany),​ Sunethra,​ Veena,​ Nimal,​ Sampath,​ Preethi and late Prasanna Mendis. Funeral Service will be held at “The Restpect Home” by Jayaratne’s,​ Borella at 2 p.m. on 2nd May 2024 and Cortege leaves Jayaratne Restpect Home at 3 p.m. for Cremation at the Borella Cemetery.
